dict.acceptation: 使惊恐；警告；给（门等）安装警报器；

sent.orig: This includes system calls such as alarm, getitimer, and sleep.
sent.trans: 这包括诸如alarm,getitimer,和sleep等系统调用。

sent.orig: Alarm function: an emergency alarm, alarm displacement, speed alarm, exceed alarm, low-battery alarm, anti-theft alarm.
sent.trans: 报警功能：紧急报警、位移报警、超速报警、越区报警、低电报警、防盗报警。

sent.orig: DSC is intrusion alarm control panels, intrusion alarm detection devices and alarm communication products and services.
sent.trans: DSC是侵扰警报控制表盘、侵扰警报探测装置和警报通讯产品和服务的代名词。

sent.orig: BSL laboratories should have automatic fire alarm. Local alarm device preferredorder to give pre-alarm of fire.
sent.trans: 在生物安全实验室区域设置火灾自动报警装置。建议采用区域报警设备，对生物安全实验室进行火灾预警。

sent.orig: Intelligent automatic alarm system: Including fire alarm control equipment, automatic fire alarm system, etc.
sent.trans: 智能型自动报警系统。含火灾报警控制装置、火灾自动报警系统等。
